item.title: Imparative and Declarative coding?
item.description: As a software engineer, I have written a lot of lines of code, and taking a hindsight back to the very first dayd of my career, I have written a log of bad code. Recently, I published a new version of my react-here-maps library which saw a sprinkle of my improved experience
